attributes.action: Don’t introduce teaching primary kids about the 100 genders.
attributes.additional_details: Rishi sunak, stated whilst at the conservative conference that it was common sense that your either a man or a women.
attributes.background: I would like this as I would like kids in the UK to not be taught about there being 100+ genders. It is clearly common sense that there are men and women, so therefore we should not be teaching children there are others.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/646173
